attributes.action: Free Kumbuka from the London Zoo
attributes.additional_details:
How would you feel being locked up in a glass box? 
Not just that but also people screaming and staring at you everyday of your lives! 
As you may of heard Kumbukas escape from the Great London Zoo. Thereafter researching hes been aggresively recently (youtube video in september 2015); why not let him go? 
Making money from a natural animal which does not belong there is cruel. This is worse than people doing time in prison. Let these animals be free. Let them go.
attributes.background:
As you may of heard Kumbukas escape from the Great London Zoo. 
Making money from a natural animal which does not belong there is cruel. This is worse than people doing time in prison. Let these animals be free. Its very obvious he broke out for a reason!

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of London Zoo, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition calling on Parliament to change the law, to ban the keeping of animals in zoos - if that is what you would like to happen.
